title: Population of Virginia , by race and ethnicity 2018
summary: The Population Virginia Race in the race ethnicity was Race Hispanic_or_Latino_(of_any_race) , who made 5224295 residents .
The most Virginia Race was Two_or_more_races , with just 4587 residents .

In second place was Race Black_or_African_American_alone with 1597761 residents ; third place went to Race White_alone with 5224295 residents ; fourth place went to Race Native_Hawaiian_and_Other_Pacific_Islander_alone with 4587 residents and fifth place went to Race Asian_alone , who was 550696 residents .

data.Race: American Indian and Alaska Native alone
Native Hawaiian and Other Pacific Islander alone

gold: This statistic shows the population of Virginia , distinguished by race and Hispanic origin in 2018 . In 2018 , about 1.6 million people in Virginia were Black or African American .
